body_html:
I have the same problem with version 0.7.0,
and I can't solve it even after I followed your suggestion.
Tensorflow works fine except for CNN modules.

==== Commands & Error Mesages ====
~$ python /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/models/image/cifar10/cifar10_train.py

...
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_bfc_allocator.cc:51] Creating bin of max chunk size 16.00GiB
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_bfc_allocator.cc:73] Allocating 11.27GiB bytes.
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_bfc_allocator.cc:83] GPU 0 memory begins at 0x1306d40000 extends to 0x15d8484a67
F tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:828] failed to enqueue convolution on stream: CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM
Aborted (core dumped)

body:
I have the same problem with version 0.7.0, 
and I can't solve it even after I followed your suggestion.
Tensorflow works fine except for CNN modules.

==== Commands & Error Mesages ====
~$ python /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/models/image/cifar10/cifar10_train.py

...
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_bfc_allocator.cc:51] Creating bin of max chunk size 16.00GiB
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_bfc_allocator.cc:73] Allocating 11.27GiB bytes.
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_bfc_allocator.cc:83] GPU 0 memory begins at 0x1306d40000 extends to 0x15d8484a67
F tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:828] failed to enqueue convolution on stream: CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM
Aborted (core dumped)
